title: Fitting In, Standing Out: Finding Your Authentic Voice at Work
description: How to become a stronger leader and a better teammate.Whatever your role or job, you need to find the sweet spot where you can fit in with your team, yet still have the ability to express your true opinions in a way that will be heard and accepted. This book is about finding that sweet spot.It is an essential read for anyone who:- wants to make sure they are heard, regardless of rank or position- is currently going through induction into a new team or organisation- is on the fringe of a team, struggling to have impact- leads a team and wants to ensure each member can play an effective role- runs a company and wants to ensure the culture is conducive to authentic leadership at all levels.
author: Harold Hillman
